_header: Put not in this world too much trust
Subjects: transitoriness, of world; vanity, against worldly
_description: On the vanity of the world — one couplet

BLHar2321.Transcription: Put not in this world to much trustthe riches whereof will turne to dust
BLHar2321.Note: Added to right margin by a later hand.

Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.
